introduce.title: What is ChatGPT Caricature?
introduce.label: About
introduce.description: ChatGPT Caricature is the viral AI art trend sweeping social media in 2026. Users upload a selfie and receive a playful, exaggerated cartoon portrait that highlights their facial features, profession, and personality. Our AI caricature generator makes this even easier — no ChatGPT Plus subscription needed. Simply upload a photo, choose a style, and get your personalized caricature portrait in seconds.

items.title: Upload Any Photo
items.description: Simply upload a clear face photo and our AI will analyze your features to create a personalized caricature drawing that captures your likeness perfectly.

items.title: 11 Unique Caricature Styles
items.description: Choose from Classic, Pro-Roast Job, 3D Cartoon, Comic, Chibi, Pop Art, Action Figure, Claymation, Simpsons, South Park, and Editorial Art — each designed to give you a distinct cartoon portrait look.

items.title: Personalize Your Portrait
items.description: Add your job title, hobbies, and personality traits to make your caricature truly one-of-a-kind, just like the trending "me and my job" AI caricature style.

image.alt: Personalize cartoon portrait with job details

items.title: Instant High-Quality Results
items.description: Get your caricature portrait in seconds. Download in high resolution, ready for social media sharing, profile pictures, or printing as a gift.

styles.title: Explore ChatGPT Caricature Styles
styles.description: Every face tells a different story. Pick from 11 AI caricature styles — from classic to viral trends like Action Figure, Simpsons, and South Park — to find the look that matches your personality.

items.title: Classic Caricature
items.description: Traditional big-head, small-body style with exaggerated facial features. The most popular choice for funny cartoon portraits.

image.alt: Classic caricature style with exaggerated features

items.title: Job Caricature
items.description: Inspired by the viral "me and my job" trend. Your cartoon portrait is surrounded by profession-specific props, tools, and themed elements.

items.title: 3D Cartoon

items.title: Comic Style
items.description: Bold outlines, dynamic poses, and superhero comic book aesthetics for your exaggerated portrait.

items.title: Chibi
items.description: Adorable anime-inspired caricature with large eyes, small body, and kawaii proportions.

items.title: Pop Art
items.description: Andy Warhol-inspired bold colors and halftone patterns for a striking, retro cartoon portrait.

howItWorks.title: How to Create Your AI Caricature Portrait
howItWorks.description: Turn any photo into a ChatGPT Caricature in 3 simple steps. No drawing skills required — our AI caricature maker handles everything for you.

items.title: Upload Your Photo
items.description: Choose a clear, well-lit face photo. Front-facing portraits work best for the most accurate and expressive caricature results.

items.title: Choose a Caricature Style
items.description: Pick one of our 11 unique styles — Classic, Pro-Roast, 3D Cartoon, Comic, Chibi, Pop Art, Action Figure, Claymation, Simpsons, South Park, or Editorial Art. Optionally add your profession, hobbies, or personality traits for a personalized touch.

items.title: Download & Share
items.description: Your AI-generated caricature is ready in seconds. Download in high resolution and share it on Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn, or WhatsApp.

benefits.title: Why Choose Our ChatGPT Caricature Generator?
benefits.description: More than just a filter — our ChatGPT Caricature generator produces truly personalized, high-quality cartoon portraits that stand out from generic tools.

items.title: No ChatGPT Plus Required
items.description: Unlike using ChatGPT directly, our dedicated caricature tool requires no subscription, no prompt engineering, and no daily image limits. Simply upload and create.

items.title: Real Face Recognition, Not Guesswork
items.description: Our AI analyzes your actual photo to produce a cartoon portrait that truly resembles you. Every caricature captures your unique facial structure, expressions, and proportions.

items.title: Professional-Grade Output
items.description: Download high-resolution caricature images perfect for social media profiles, printed gifts, business cards, or team page avatars. No watermarks on paid plans.

items.title: Privacy-First Approach
items.description: Your uploaded photos are processed securely and not stored after generation. Unlike trending ChatGPT caricature methods, we don't access your chat history or personal data.

faq.title: AI Caricature Generator FAQ
faq.description: Everything you need to know about creating ChatGPT Caricature portraits.

items.question: What is a ChatGPT Caricature?
items.answer: A ChatGPT Caricature is a viral AI art trend from 2026 where advanced AI models transform a selfie into a fun, exaggerated cartoon portrait. The trend started when users asked ChatGPT to create playful caricatures based on their photos and personal details. Our dedicated AI caricature generator takes this concept further — you get professional-quality caricature portraits from your photos without needing a ChatGPT Plus subscription.

items.question: How does the AI caricature generator work?
items.answer: Upload a clear face photo, select one of our 11 caricature styles (Classic, Pro-Roast, 3D Cartoon, Comic, Chibi, Pop Art, Action Figure, Claymation, Simpsons, South Park, or Editorial Art), optionally add your job title or hobbies, and click Create. Our AI analyzes your facial features — structure, expression, and proportions — then generates a personalized cartoon portrait in seconds.

items.question: What photo works best for AI caricatures?
items.answer: A clear, well-lit face photo produces the best results. Front-facing portraits with even lighting give the most accurate and fun caricature output. Avoid group photos, heavy filters, sunglasses, or images where the face is partially obscured.

items.question: How much does it cost to create a caricature?
items.answer: Each caricature costs 20 credits. Start with our Credits Pack at $4.9 for 400 credits (20 caricatures), or subscribe to the monthly plan at $9.9/month for 500 credits (25 caricatures per month). Both options include full high-resolution downloads.

items.question: Can I use my caricature for commercial purposes?
items.answer: Yes! You own the rights to your generated caricature portraits. Use them freely for social media profiles, business cards, team pages, gifts, merchandise, marketing materials, and more.

items.question: What caricature styles are available?
items.answer: We offer 11 distinct styles: Classic Caricature (traditional big-head with exaggerated features), Pro-Roast Job (profession-themed with work props), 3D Cartoon (Pixar/Disney-inspired), Comic Style (superhero comic book look), Chibi (cute anime proportions), Pop Art (bold colors inspired by Andy Warhol), Action Figure (collectible toy packaging), Claymation (Wallace & Gromit texture), TV Satire - Simpsons (yellow skin), TV Satire - South Park (paper cutout), and Editorial Art (vintage editorial cartoon style).

items.question: How is this different from using ChatGPT directly?
items.answer: Unlike using ChatGPT directly, our tool is purpose-built for caricature creation. You don't need a paid ChatGPT subscription, there's no prompt engineering required, and there are no daily image limits. We also offer 11 specialized caricature styles (including viral trends like Action Figure and TV Satire), real face recognition from your uploaded photo, and consistent high-quality results every time.

items.question: Is my photo data safe and private?
items.answer: Absolutely. Your uploaded photos are processed securely and are not stored permanently after generation. Unlike the ChatGPT caricature trend that relies on your chat history, our tool only uses the photo you upload — no personal data mining.

items.question: Can I create a 'me and my job' caricature?
items.answer: Yes! The Job Caricature style is designed exactly for the viral 'me and my job' trend. Enter your profession and the AI will surround your cartoon portrait with relevant tools, props, and workplace elements that represent your career.
